Hero.title: Create bulletins with
Hero.description: Platform to create, review and distribute professional agroclimatic bulletins collaboratively.

Features.title: Everything you need to create
Features.description: A collaborative tool that simplifies the process of creating, reviewing and distributing agroclimatic bulletins.

feature1.title: Bulletin Generation
feature1.description: Create professional agroclimatic bulletins with an intuitive editor designed specifically for each country.

feature2.title: Flexible Export
feature2.description: Export your bulletins in multiple formats: PDF for printing or images in PNG or JPG format to share on social networks.

feature3.title: Review Workflow
feature3.description: Complete collaborative review system with version control, comments and approvals to ensure content quality.

feature4.title: Custom Templates
feature4.description: Create and save reusable templates that adapt to your specific needs.

Footer.description: Free tool to create agroclimatic bulletins collaboratively.
